reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released Feb 18 revealed a surprise 'hawkish pause' with officials discussing potential rate hikes if inflation remains sticky. This was compounded on Feb 20 by a hotter-than-expected Core PCE print of 0.4% MoM, which challenged the disinflation narrative.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released Feb 18 revealed a surprise 'hawkish pause' with officials discussing potential rate hikes if inflation remains sticky. This was compounded on Feb 20 by a hotter-than-expected Core PCE print of 0.4% MoM, which challenged the disinflation narrative.
payload.market_impact: Significant US Dollar strengthening; sharp declines in gold (down over 10%) and silver; Bitcoin fell over 25%; US Treasury yields climbed as markets repriced for a 'higher-for-longer' environment.
